Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
The ProjectController class manages BTO (Build-To-Order) housing projects in the system. It provides functionality for creating, retrieving, filtering, editing, and deleting projects, as well as managing project visibility and flat availability.

This controller maintains a map of all projects indexed by their names for efficient retrieval and provides methods to filter projects based on various criteria.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectController

      public ProjectController()
      Default constructor for ProjectController. Initializes an empty map to store projects.

  • Method Details

    • filterProjects

      public List<Project> filterProjects(FilterCriteria criteria)
      Filters projects based on specified criteria. Projects that match all criteria in the FilterCriteria object are included in the result.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The criteria to filter projects by
      Returns:
      A list of projects that match all the specified criteria

    • getProjectByName

      public Project getProjectByName(String projectName)
      Retrieves a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Project object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllProjects

      public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Project objects

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(Project project)
      Creates a new project in the system. The project is only created if it has a unique name.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to create
      Returns:
      The created Project object if successful, null if the project is invalid or a project with the same name already exists

    • editProject

      public boolean editProject(Project project, Map<String,Object> changes)
      Edits an existing project with the specified changes. Supports changing neighborhood, visibility, and application dates.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to edit
      changes - A map of field names to new values
      Returns:
      true if the edit was successful, false if the project is invalid or not found

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes a project from the system.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false if the project is invalid or not found

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(Project project, boolean visible)
      Toggles the visibility of a project. Visible projects can be seen and applied to by eligible applicants.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to toggle visibility for
      visible - The new visibility status to set
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was set successfully, false if the project is invalid or not found

    • getVisibleProjectsForApplicant

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjectsForApplicant(User user)
      Retrieves all visible projects that the specified user is eligible to apply for. A project is considered eligible if the user qualifies for at least one flat type in the project.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      A list of visible projects that the user is eligible to apply for

    • getEligibleFlatTypes

      public List<FlatType> getEligibleFlatTypes(Project project, User user)
      Retrieves all flat types that a user is eligible to apply for in a specific project. The eligibility is determined based on the user's age, marital status, and other factors.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check flat type eligibility for
      user - The user to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      A list of FlatType objects that the user is eligible to apply for

    • updateFlatAvailability

      public boolean updateFlatAvailability(Project project, FlatType flatType, int quantity)
      Updates the availability of a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update flat availability for
      flatType - The type of flat to update
      quantity - The new quantity of available flats
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if the project is invalid or not found

    • getProjects

      public Map<String,Project> getProjects()
      Gets the map of all projects indexed by project name.
      Returns:
      The map of project name to Project objects

    • setProjects

      public void setProjects(List<Project> projectList)
      Sets the projects map from a list of Project objects. Clears the existing map and rebuilds it using the project names as keys.
      Parameters:
      projectList - The list of projects to set
